biography.content:
Elisa Quintarelli is a Full Professor at the University of Verona. Her research interests have included graph-based databases, representing and querying semistructured databases, customizing and integrating data in context-driven distributed databases, design of context-aware databases and applications such as recommendation systems.
She has recently become interested in the ethical issues inherently involved in data analysis techniques.

Elisa Quintarelli is Associate Editor for the Data Science and Engineering Journal; she has been, and is, a reviewer of international journals (e.g., VLDB Journal, Information Systems, DKE) and a member of the Program Committees of several prestigious international conferences.
